tool_description: Assesses sample quality and acceptability for testing based on visual inspection, volume, integrity, and contamination indicators.

visual_appearance.description: Visual assessment: normal, hemolyzed, lipemic, icteric, clotted, contaminated

container_integrity.description: Whether the container is intact and properly sealed

labeling_quality.description: Label condition: clear, smudged, partial, missing

temperature_compliant.description: Whether sample was maintained at proper temperature

error_messages: Sample not found: sample_barcode does not exist in the system.
Invalid visual appearance: Use one of [normal, hemolyzed, lipemic, icteric, clotted, contaminated].
Invalid volume: sample_volume must be a positive number.
Invalid labeling quality: Use one of [clear, smudged, partial, missing].
Missing quality parameters: All quality assessment parameters are required.
usage: Assess sample quality by providing visual_appearance, sample_volume, container_integrity, labeling_quality, and temperature_compliant status. The tool determines sample acceptability for testing.

quality_status.description: Overall quality assessment: ACCEPTABLE, QUESTIONABLE, or REJECTED

testing_restrictions.description: Tests that cannot be performed due to quality issues

recommendation.description: Recommended action: PROCEED, RECOLLECT, or PARTIAL_TESTING
